subject: Order : SSN3046
description_text:
Hi,



I am following up again regarding the replacement shipment you stated would be sent via express delivery. It is now the 25th, and I still have not received the pedals.



It has been over a month since I placed my original order, and this level of delay is completely unacceptable. This item was intended as a present, and the ongoing issues have caused significant inconvenience. Given the repeated missed delivery timeframes and lack of resolution, I believe compensation is appropriate.



I need a clear and immediate update on the status of my order, including accurate tracking information and confirmation of when I can expect the delivery.



Please address this matter urgently.



Thank you,

Chelsea Zealand


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7361 中
